title: Interactive AI Job Share Map
text:
Have you ever wondered which U.S. counties lead in AIâ€‘related job postings? This interactive map highlights both the average AI share over 2018â€‘2023 and the percentageâ€‘point change since 2017â€‘2018.

Average AI Share shows where AI roles are most concentrated today.

Change in AI Share reveals the fastestâ€‘growing hotspots of remoteâ€‘friendly AI jobs.

Toggle between layers to explore regional patterns and see how traditional tech hubs compare with emerging counties.








Map Takeaways: Even outside Silicon Valley, some unexpected corners of Americaâ€”like Slope County (ND) and Maries County (MO)â€”have AI roles making up over 5â€“10% of all job ads. Meanwhile, many rural and industrial counties remain below 1%. Between 2018 and 2023, suburban and remoteâ€‘friendly regions saw the fastest growth, underscoring how AI work is decoupling from traditional tech hubs. This uneven landscape highlights both the promise of remote work and the risk that smaller communities could be left behind in the AI economy.
